{{also|student|stüdent|študent}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|studente}}, from {{der|de|ML.|studēns}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ʃtuˈdɛnt/}} * {{audio|de|De-Student.ogg|audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Studenten|Studenten|f=Studentin}} # [[student]] (male or of unspecified sex) {{gloss|person attending lectures at a university}} #:
